title: Help identifying font
content:
Please can anybody tell me what font this is

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nailsfront2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213222/http:/typophile.com/files/nailsfront2.jpg) | 132.39 KB |
author: roglioro

comments.content:
It must be **[Bodega Sans Light Oldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213222/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Font-Bureau&ffam=BodegaSans%20LightOldstyle%20-%20Regular&fid=fb300ddbbeba5af58b7ac0f6eec8c357&fsize=60&text=MANICURE%20SPA%20PEDICURE%20DESIGNS&fit=1)** by Greg Thompson (1990, Font Bureau)

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011213222/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
